text: Manuel "El Loco" Valdés (29 January 1931 - 28 August 2020) was a Mexican actor and comedian. He was member of the Valdés family. He was the brother of Ramón Valdés (aka "Don Ramón"), from the sitcom "El Chavo", and Germán Valdés (aka "Tin Tan"). He was also the father of singer Cristian Castro and Marcos Valdés. He was known for his roles in La Carabina de Ambrosio, La pulquería, La leyenda de la Nahuala, Caperucita y Pulgarcito contra los monstruos and Calabacitas tiernas. He was in three telenovelas: Amy, la niña de la mochila azúl (2004), Entre el amor y el odio (2002) and Siempre te amaré (2000).
